page.title: 06SHOPPING IN LECHLADE
page.content: This is a typical shopping list. {PERSONAL ITEMS.}Hairspray 79p, Toothpaste 57p, Deodorant 79p, Lipstick 70p, Toilet Rolls 60p, Shampoo 66p, Soap 32p. {CLEANING ITEMS.}Polish 69p, Washing-up Liquid 49p, Bleach 49p, Washing Powder Â£1.57. {FOOD.}Tin Baked Beans 23p, Sausages 77p, Chicken Â£2.45, Bacon Â£1.58 lb., Potatoes 9p lb., Apples 44p lb., Bananas 50p lb., Butter 53p, Flour 44p, Crisps 12p, Eggs (size 4) 42p for half a dozen. Bread 49p, Mars Bar 18p, Biscuits 17p, Cheese Â£1.23 lb. {MISCELLANEOUS}Batteries 86p, Light bulb 43p, Elastoplast 65p, Postage Stamp 17p. {TOTAL} Â£19.42 All items priced in a typical Lechlade food store.
